revision.text: Possibly: The principles of the English language digested: or, English grammar reduced to analogy. By James Elphinston. In two volumes. ( London : Printed for James Bettenham, and sold by P Vaillant, in the Strand; L. Hawes, W. Clarke, and R. Collins, in Paternoster-Row; J. Dodsley, in Pall-Mall; and W. Drummond, Edinburgh, MDCCLXV. [1765]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2488742~S1
